items.title: What on earth is going on with the American consumer?
items.description: U.S. workers are not sure whether to buy that new car — or brace for a recession.

items.title: Can media-company spinoffs of brands like CNN and CNBC be good for investors? Here’s what history tells us.
items.description: Recent corporate media spinoffs have been a mixed bag, with many failing due to the way they were set up, Wall Street analysts say.

items.title: Don’t count on an inheritance: Baby boomers are hanging on to their money
items.description: How to tell your children you plan to “die with zero.”
